ygData.subject: Re: Roleplaying
ygData.msgSnippet: Not to add my voice to the list of siriens offering you roleplaying only to dash you along the rocks, inches away from an angry cyclops, but I m a member of
ygData.messageBody:
Not to add my voice to the list of siriens offering
you roleplaying only to dash you along the rocks,
inches away from an angry cyclops, but I'm a member of
the Avengers Federation on Erollosi Marr. I'm the
official loresinger for the guild. We have a great
web page and message board, and our guild meetings are
usually punctuated with drinking and revelrie, and
always end with exchanging gifts, where the younger
give away a pp or 2 they may have earned, and some of
the older ones giving away full sets of ringmail or
special weapons. Our guildsay is constantly active
with people helping each other out. One of our nobles
is only level 4 but a great role player. Check out
our website. Look for the stories from Llewrend. The
address is http://www.wobblewire.com/avengers_site.
Drop me a line or a tell for more info.
